function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"High mortality rate due to COVID-19","Impact":"Increased loss of working hours and economic downturn","Mitigation":"Vaccination campaigns, public health measures, and healthcare infrastructure improvement","Technologies":"Vaccines, contact tracing apps, and telehealth services","People":"General population, particularly those with low socioeconomic status","Owner":"Health policymakers and government"},{"Description":"Increased susceptibility of vulnerable groups to health hazards","Impact":"Unequal burden of disease and higher mortality rates among vulnerable communities","Mitigation":"Improving access to healthcare, social resources, and targeted public health interventions","Technologies":"Telemedicine, community health workers, and targeted health education programs","People":"Communities with low socioeconomic status, minorities, and marginalized groups","Owner":"Public health organizations and local healthcare providers"},{"Description":"Escalating inequality due to the pandemic","Impact":"Exacerbation of existing socioeconomic disparities and widening of the wealth gap","Mitigation":"Implementing social support programs, income assistance, and job creation initiatives","Technologies":"Digital platforms for social support, remote work technologies, and online skill development programs","People":"Population affected by economic downturn, low-income households, and marginalized communities","Owner":"Government agencies and non-profit organizations"}]}
